1.0.1.name: wordpress/custom-ads-sidebar
1.0.1.description:
This plugin help admin display different ads for different post. For example: In a topic you write about travel service, you could display travel ads such as hotel, restaurant, tour... by adding ads directly in single post edit page. To display your ads, please add html code to field when editting post. Good for user want to add custom advertising for each single post . This plugin will be power when intergate with Ads in Right Bottom plugin.

Demo here! See the banner in right sidebar.
